reviews.review:
Cuando juegas bien eres cheto, cuando juegas mal eres noob.

Pinche juego está plagado de chetos (de verdad, no jugadores buenos, como el renglón anterior) y estúpidos admin, que son una bola de imbéciles y que se ardillean cuando los matas y te banean; así de la nada. Y claro está, faltan los admin con cheto, que se creen Dioses porque los rascahuevos de sus comapeños de clan lo ideolatran sólo para tener admin.

Está plagado de niños rata que llevan 3 meses jugando y creen que lo han visto todo. Y cuando llega alguien veterano, que sabe jugar y les patea el trasero se van llorando con el admin más cercano para acusarlos de chetos. Te dicen cheto si los matas cegado, como si el sonido no importara. Cuando los esperas en un lugar; puesto que ya las escuchado desde hace kilómetros y al final te dice "¿cómo sabías que estaba ahí?" Es porque de verdad son unos niños rata. Siempre spammean los pinches chiquillos por el micrófono; poniendo música a todo lo que da. Y claro, están los que nunca se callan, parece que tiene aceite en la leguna porque siempre se les resbala decir pendejadas. 

En fin. El juego ha perdido su carisma, su popularidad y su forma de jugarlo. Actualmente está plagado de niños rata que sólo te cagarán el juego. Ahora existen mejores juegos que el CS 1.6.
El mejor shooter multijugador de la historia, con gráficos anticuados pero una inigualable jugabilidad. Recomendado.

Playing since beta version 6.5! Best esports shooter ever! 10/10

Counter Strike is an first person shooter that was released in the late 90's.

Whats it about?

Well Counter strike is an online first person shooter where you either play as an terrorist or an counter terrorist. 
The terrorists objective is to transport a bomb to a bombsite located on each map marked as (A) or (B). Whilst the counter terrorists main objective is to stop the terrorist force from planting the bomb. 
Theres also a gamemode  where the terrorists will have hostages and the counter terrorists objective is to rescue the hostages before the time runs out. 
Game ends when the counter terrorists has saved all hostages or the terrorists has whiped all counter terrorists. 

Is it worth buying?

Since this is an really old game and the graphics are really outdated compared to the games we have today i would still say this game is worth buying. 
The game is over 15 years old but still has a alot of active players and playing with friends make it even better. 
Counter Strike also has alot of maps, mods and other stuff that makes the game better in any way.

Graphics. 7/10

Gameplay. 10/10

Play the world's number 1 online action game. Engage in an incredibly realistic brand of terrorist warfare in this wildly popular team-based game. Ally with teammates to complete strategic missions. Take out enemy sites. Rescue hostages. Your role affects your team's success. Your team's success affects your role.
how does this cost money! its a fucking mod lol

The original CS.

This is where it all started, 1.6. While many forget about 1.4, 1.5 and those versions, 1.6 is a great standalone title.

Graphics wise, you have to be able to run this. If you can't run CS at all, not sure why you have Steam. Simple, and basic is what a lot of people would describe the look and feel of CS to be.

If you haven't played HL original it make look a little stupid, but the game is still great inside. Original can't get more original here -- when talking about the base game idea(s).

Great for people with low end comps and internet like Link Freeman and his dial up. This game was made a while back so keep that in mind!

7/10

I used to play this game with my friends when we had to do military service; it was a lot of fun pretending that we were fighting Russians while putting to use what we would learn during training. However, it seems that the only people who play now are Turkish children who hack and have bad ping so, I would not recommend this game any more.
you and you life shit? try it!

Counter-Strike всегда была о том, чтобы занять выгодную позицию и настрелять как можно больше фрагов. Конечно, все мы видели записи с турниров, где команды играют от атаки и больше нацелены на победу, но на публичных серверах всегда найдутся любители посидеть в укромном месте. Кемперов ненавидели еще на заре CS, особенно тех, кто в одиночку оставался против всей (или почти всей) команды противника и начинал ныкаться по углам. 

Ненавидели, но терпели: любительский мод к Half-Life, в отличие от популярных тогда Quake 3 Arena и Unreal Tournament, предлагал совершенно новый игровой опыт, за который прощали и необходимость ждать возрождения до конца раунда, и далеко не идеальный дизайн карт, и наличие явных фаворитов в боевом арсенале, и обилие читеров. А Valve Software регулярно проводила работу над ошибками, продлевая жизнь стареющей игре – по числу игроков Counter-Strike и поныне занимает в Steam первые позиции рейтинга.

More than 5k hours played... 
The Best Tactical Team FPS online game ever.

Pro's
     - Very light game
     - Intuitive
     - Team or Solo play
     - Customizable Mods
     - Huge Community

Con's
     - Way too easy to customize (cheaters)
     - Low Tick servers
     - VAC is a joke, it always needs good admins

+ Communauté gigantesque et vivante même après autant d'années
+ Un classique qui à révolutionner le multijoueur sur PC
- Difficile d'approche due à l'expertise des joueurs vétérans

8/10 Get it !

スコア：95 / ジャンル：FPS / 難易度：高 / パズル：無

世界で一番有名なFPSの対戦ゲーム。私も過去に2000時間以上はプレイしている。初心者には厳しい仕様なので、人によっては全く合わないかもしれない。現在だと各銃のリコイルコントロールの違いを覚えたり、ストッピングなどを覚えたり、FGなどの使いどころを各マップで覚えたりする必要性がある。これができないと一方的に狩られるだけなので、ハードルが高いゲームである。しかし、慣れるとゲーム性の高さや、戦術性の高さもあってとても楽しめる。
CS is the only FPS that is DA SHIT

This I suggest you buy instead of Counter-Strike: Source if you have a slower computer and you want the game to work fine. Even though its age, it is still very fun. One of the best, if not the best multiplayer you will ever have on PC. If you have ever heard of rumors and what-not over hackers and  and people who will kill you with an AK-47 from half the map away. I have yet to see a hacker in Couter-Strike and if your new, you will play on servers with less skilled people like yourself if you are new so don't worry about that. Great buy. Get it and enjoy 9.8/10

[quote] Counter Strike 1.6 - Vale a Pena Comprar? [/quote]

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vhFVdDtOGgg

- Counter Strike é da época das Lan House (quem jogou sabe o que estou falando), da época do café da manhã pagando R$ 3 reais e jogando 3 horas, naqueles computadores com Windows 98 Second Edition, monitores de 17 polegadas CRT que são aqueles pesados, quadrados e conhecidos como tubão.

- Velhos tempos em que eu pegava minha bicicleta, faltava dos compromissos e ia me divertir na lan house.

- Para quem ainda não conhece o Counter Strike ele surgiu no ano de 2000 e ficou conhecido popularmente pelos brasileiros como Contra Strike, o famoso jogo de polícia e ladrão, da fase do CS_RIO que os manos vão descendo a ladeira, lembra?

- Naquela época a internet era discada e raramente você conhecia alguém que jogava ele online.

- Bom vamos ao que interessa, direto no ponto vale a comprar o Counter Strike 1.6 ?

Compatibilidade: Windows 10
Multiplayer: Servidores Online
Jogadores: Ativos (BR)
Preço Médio: R$ 19,99
Preço Recorde: R$ 4,99

- Considerando estas informações eu só posso dizer:

- Sim! Vale a pena sim comprar Counter Strike 1.6, tanto você que quer relembrar os velhos tempos, matar a saudade e se divertir ou para você que nunca teve a honra e oportunidade de jogar este jogo mundialmente famoso que marcou uma geração de gamers.

▼ Comprar Counter Strike 1.6 na Steam

http://store.steampowered.com/app/10/
